</a>
 or

Use this badge for websites, software, music, art, ... that were created completely by humans with no help from generative artificial intelligence. Use this badge to communicate that you have not used even a little bit of generative AI in your work.

What this badge is NOT:

  • A guarantee that no generative artificial intelligence was used.
  • A badge to promote the Anti-AI ideaological standpoint.
  • A badge for activists to promote any kind of religious, political or philosophical ideaology.

This badge is not meant to promote the dis-use of generative AI. I'm not an activist. You may use this badge regardless of your views on AI or the use of generative AI in Art.
